tooltip: Select Urbosa, Ashinon General, as your hero of choice.

heroSelectionDescriptionElements.tooltipText: Urbosa greatly improves the armor and durability of many units.
Allows you to summon Urbosa, a durable infantry Hero with high damage and a strong sheild.
Infantry unit with Magic resistant armor.
All Infantry units have 15% more HP.
Marauders and Tomb Guards gain Magic resistant armor.
